named-query.name: BC_READ_RATING_SUMMARIES_BY_ITEM_ID_AND_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ratingSummary FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.rating.domain.RatingSummary ratingSummary WHERE ratingSummary.ratingTypeStr = :ratingType AND ratingSummary.itemId IN (:itemIds)

named-query.name: BC_READ_RATING_SUMMARY_BY_ITEM_ID_AND_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ratingSummary FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.rating.domain.RatingSummary ratingSummary WHERE ratingSummary.ratingTypeStr = :ratingType AND ratingSummary.itemId = :itemId

named-query.name: BC_READ_RATING_DETAIL_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_RATING_SUMMARY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ratingDetail FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.rating.domain.RatingDetail ratingDetail WHERE ratingDetail.customer.id = :customerId AND ratingDetail.ratingSummary.id = :ratingSummaryId

named-query.name: BC_READ_REVIEW_DETAIL_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_RATING_SUMMARY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT reviewDetail FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.rating.domain.ReviewDetail reviewDetail WHERE reviewDetail.customer.id = :customerId AND reviewDetail.ratingSummary.id = :ratingSummaryId

named-query.name: BC_READ_REVIEW_DETAIL_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_ITEM_ID
named-query.query: SELECT reviewDetail FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.rating.domain.ReviewDetail reviewDetail WHERE reviewDetail.customer.id = :customerId AND reviewDetail.ratingSummary.itemId = :itemId
